Portfolio Website

The website you are viewing right now!

Created using: HTML, Javascript, Node.js, CSS, Flexbox and Sass


This website was created using the technologies and skills that I have learnt thus far. For example, instead of using CSS directly I decided to work with Sass as it allows the use of functions and variables and writes changes to the CSS file automatically. Media queries were used to adjust page elements according to screen size. Javascript was used to create the website menu and the TypeWriter effect that can be seen on the homepage. Flex was used to create the boxes found on the How To Reach Me page.
